sentences.en: However, these elements of risk can be mitigated by spending more effort developing the queries; as with many development options, there is a tradeoff between query complexity and query stability.
sentences.cn: 但是，可以多花些精力来开发查询，从而减轻这些风险元素；正如许多开发选择一样，在查询的复杂性与查询的稳定性之间会有一个权衡。

sentences.en: I faced a tradeoff between eating and buying my medicine.
sentences.cn: 我面临吃下或买下我的药的选择.

sentences.en: If there is a tradeoff between energy and entropy, it certainly goes on without any remorse.
sentences.cn: 光子引擎,如果这个宇宙的定律是要以熵换取能量的话, 这也未免太苛刻了.

sentences.en: In many cases, this is a valuable tradeoff.
sentences.cn: 很多情况下, 这是笔值得的买卖.

sentences.en: Just one of the tradeoff's in the internet market place.
sentences.cn: 顾客服务是为了开辟因特网市场而必须付出的代价.

sentences.en: Satisfying tradeoff between accurate estimation and computation complexity is achieved with such hierarchical refinement strategy.
sentences.cn: 实现了准确估计和计算复杂度的良好平衡.

sentences.en: Sensitivity, tradeoff analysis, goal programming and isoperformance.
sentences.cn: 灵敏度折衷分析, 目标规划和同效性.

sentences.en: So a tradeoff between accuracy and overhead is needed.
sentences.cn: 因此,在准确率和开销之间做出权衡十分必要.

sentences.en: So appropriate diversification is a tradeoff based on risk and business performance risk.
sentences.cn: 因此,适度多角化应该是企业在两者之间权衡的结果.

sentences.en: So under some conditions, the big tradeoff of equality and efficiency does not exist.
sentences.cn: 因此,在一些情况下, 平等与效率的两难冲突并不存在.

sentences.en: The economic basis of cooperation is the tradeoff between selfishness and generosity.
sentences.cn: 合作的经济学基础是自私与慷慨之间的权衡.

sentences.en: The experimental results show that the new system a good tradeoff between security and performance.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明,新系统在安全和性能上达到了良好平衡.

sentences.en: The tradeoff between robustness and invisibility remains the bottleneck in digital watermarking technology.
sentences.cn: 如何达到健壮性和透明性之间的平衡是数字水印技术最大难题.

sentences.en: This daily dilemma is labeled the tradeoff between exploration and exploitation.
sentences.cn: 这种日常的进退两难便归于在冒险和获益之间作权衡.
是啊, 生命就是一场交易.

words.tran_cn: 权衡；折衷；（公平）交易（等于trade-off）
